verse: Ng'o ne atinye eng' kipsengwet ne ma inye? Ama mi age ne amache eng' ng'ony kosiirin. 26 Ichuchui bortanyun ak muguleldanyu: Ago kamuktaindet kimnatetab muguleldanyu ak kebebertanyu koigeny.
10 Ago ingen inendet oret ne abune; Ye kagotiema, among'u aige tahabu.11 Kagonamgei keldanyun ak  tiegutikyik ;Kaasub orenyin,ama amaste.

8 Amu ma chekwok kabwatutikyuk, ama chechuk ortinwekwok,mwae Jehova. 9 Amu ko u ye toror kipsengwetisiek kosiir ng'ony, ko u noto tororen ortinwekyuk kosiir ortinwekwok, ak ko tororen kabwatutikyuk kosiir kabwotutikwok.
Tos ma ane  ne kiang'atin? Kimitun ak inyiganitu mising', ameiywei, anan itoptoben: amu mi Jehovah kamuktaindeng'ung' koboten eng' ui tugul ole iwendi.

14 Amu ichiichech chamnyetab kristo; amu kigeere kou ni, kele kimechi chito agenge tugul, noto anyun kibek tugul; 15 ak kimechi inendet tugul, si ma kosoptos agobo ge icheget che soptos, ago agobo inendet ne kimechi ak kong'eet kogeny
Kingeneng'nito chamyet, amu kiikoit sobondanyi agobo achek: ak kanyol kigoite sobonwekyokagobo che kitupche.

Kigigartata koboto kristo; ago asobe;ago ma ko ane, ago sobei kristo eng' ane:ak sobondo ne asobe nguno eng' borto asobe eng' kayanet ne miten eng' Weritab Jehovah, ne kichama, ak kiigoitogei agobo ane.
Amu ye kita ko ki bunik, ko kigituiyech ak Jehovah eng' meetab werinyin, ne siirei mising' anyun, koga kituiyech, kesoruech eng' sobondannyi.
inendet ko kakweng'etab lilindanyi, ak itondo ne bo indennyi,ak kotononi tuguk tugul eng' ng'olyotab kamuktaennyi, kingo kagoyai kaundoetab tengekwogik,kwo kotebe eutab tai ne bo Etunatet eng' barak;

Ma  gonu kamang'unet kililan; amu kigerong'ji chamnyetab Jehovah mugulelwekyok eng' Tamirmiriet ne Tilil ne kigegonech. 6 Amu ye kita ko ki nyalulyotin, kome kristo agobo che yaachen eng' betut ne kiga kelewen. 7 Amu bichii kome chi agobo chi ne bo imanda: ago abere kanyei chito age kome agobo chi ne mie. 8 Ago iboruech achek  Jehovah chamnyennyi, amu ye kita ko ki kiptengeginik, kome Kristo agobo achek.
inendet ne kiib tengekwogikyok eng' bortanyin eng ketit  barak, si kesopche eng' imanda; achek che kiga kebekyi tengekwogik; kigisoobenok birutikyik.

Kimwachi tugul kolenji, Ngo machei chi age tugul kosubwa, ko ingoesiogei, ak koib kimurtoiyondenyi betut age tugul, ak kosubwa.24 Amu age tugul ne machei kosor sobondanyi kobeeti;ak age tugul ne ibeeti sobondanyi agobo ane, ko noto ne soru.
amu kigoyai tugul tengek, ama ityin torornatetab Jehovah; 24 che kiityin imanda buch eng' mieindanyi eng' katiaget ne mi eng' Kristo Jesu.
Aboruok anyun, che kitupche, nguno,logoiywek che miach che kiaamwok choto kiotaa,choto akgichek che atonone,

Amu ng'olyondonito anyun ogoitoi aisurut agine; amu icheget ko kiboitinikab boisietab Jehovah ,che igiiljingei kotugul kioto. 7 Ogochi tugul tuguk che nyoljin; kodi eng' inendet ne nyoljin kodi;aisurut eng' inendet ne nyoljin aisurut;kaiyweisiet eng' inendet ne nyoljin kaiyweisiet;teegisto eng'inendet ne nyoljin teegisto.
Amobesen chi kiy age tugul, ago ochamnye: amu inendet ne chamei chitab kokwenyi ko kagoyai kosulda Ng'atutiet.
Amu berberindo ng'olyotab kimurtoiyot eng' icheget che lustos; ago eng' achek che kisoru ko kimnatetab Jehovah.

9 Amu ng'ing'any eng' kuting'ung', ile Jesu ko Kiptaiyat, ak iyani eng' muguleldang'ung' ile kiing'eet Jehovah inendet komong'une che kibek, kesorun: 10 amu iyani chi eng' muguleldo agoi imanda; ak ng'anyei eng kutit agoi yetunet.

20 Ago kiging'eet anyun Kristo komong' eng' che kibek, tongoaniat ne bo icheget che ruitos.21 Amu ko u ye kibunu meet chi, ko kibunu chi agine ng'eetyet ne bo che begu. 22 Amu ko u ye begu tugul eng' Adam, ko u noto tun kisoobi tugul eng' Kristo

55 Ee, meet, mi ano kabelisieng,ung,? Ee meet, mi ano ng'wanindang'ung'? 56 Ng'wanindab meet ko tengek; ak kimnatetab tengek ko ng'atutik: 57 ago kigochini Jehova kongoi, ne konech kabelisiet eng' Kiptaiyandenyo Jesu Kristo.

28 Ak agochini ichek sobondab koigeny; ak magoi lusyo, ama rebenak chi ichek eng' eunnyu. 29 O Baba,ne kigona ichek,kosiir tugul; ama mi chi ne imuchi koreb ichek eng' eutab Baba. 30 Ane ak kwanda, koki agenge.
amu kigeerei komie tugukyik che ma toogu koboch yaetab ng'ony che naoksei eng' tuguk che yaotin, agot kimnatennyi ne bo koigeny ak inendet iman ko Jehova; si maek ichek che tinyei lotania:
Amu kigisir kele, Mwaei Kiptaiyat kole, Ko u ye asobe, Tun kutung,jina kutundo age tugul, Ak kolos ng'elyepta age tugul Jehovah.

18 Ongen ole kigitiachak omong'une atebeng'wong' nebo buch ne kionyoru eng' kwanisiekwok, ma eng' tuguk che ng'emaksei, kou feda anan tahabu; 19 ago eng' korotik che bo kamanutiet ne o, ko u che bo aruet ne matinyei berut ak ne matinye tisia,choto ko korotikab Kristo.

27 che kicham Jehovah kong'ang'ji kit ne u magornatosiekab torornatet ne bo ung'otionito eng' Bororiosiek, noto Kristo eng  okwek, kamang'unetab torornatet: 28 inendet ne kimwaitoi, ak kiteechini chi age tugul ak kineti chi age tugul eng' ng'omnatet tugul, si kobiit kimut chi age tugul kogesunotgei eng' Kristo;
Eng' noto anyun komuchi kogeny kosor agoi kosuldaet ichek che bwanjin Jehovah eng' inendet, amu sobei inendet koigeny si kobiit kosaei agobo ichek.
Amu kinyo Weritab chi kocheng' ak kosor ne kiga kobet.

5 Ingotebenok ateboni,ne kimi agine eng' Kristo Jesu: 6 ne, nganda kitinyei itondab Jehovah, ko ma iit kole kit ne bo kamanut ne o kole kogergeit ak Jehovah, 7 ago kiyaigei inendet koek buch ak konam itondab otwogindet, kogergeit ak bik;8 ak kingotook eng' itondab chi, koming'ingei' kogas it agoi meet,ee, meet ne bo kimurtoiyot.
Ago  angen ale sobei Katiagindennyu, Ak tun tonone ng'ony eng' betut ne bo let
Ago Aking'alali che bo iman eng' chamyet, si keegitu eng' tuguk tugul eng' inendet, inendet ne metit, noto ko Kristo;
